new.title: Truist Insights
new.description: With Truist Insights, business customers can see snapshots of their cashflow, like spending trends, important events and flagged unusual activity, on both desktop and mobile platforms.

new.title: NorthOne’s Insights and Integrations
new.description: NorthOne’s Insights and Integrations connects with platforms like Shopify and Amazon. Users can link accounts to receive payments and view cash flow snapshots from e-commerce platforms such as Amazon, Etsy, PayPal, Shopify, Stripe, and Square. This update includes a new logo and redesign.

new.title: TD Bank tap-to-pay
new.description: This spring came with a big update to TD Bank’s mobile app. TD Bank users can now accept credit card payments in-person via mobile through new Tap-to-Pay functionality. Chase and TD are currently the only Test Drive institutions offering this feature.
